sense.gloss: onsen, hot spring resort, hot spring spa
retaining warmth, keeping heat in, heat insulation
to sit on (an idea, plan, etc.), to keep to oneself, to nurse, to mull over
gentle (nature, personality, etc.), mild, quiet, pleasant
to warm oneself, to sun oneself, to warm up, to get warm
to cool (water) down, to make less hot (e.g. by adding cold water)

gentle, quiet, mild, meek, obedient, docile, well-behaved, tame
